BatteryManagerChargingTime.summary:
The chargingTime read-only property of the interface indicates the amount of time, in seconds, that remain until the battery is fully charged, or 0 if the battery is already fully charged or the user agent is unable to report the battery status information.
If the battery is currently discharging, its value is .
When its value changes, the event is fired.

blockquote.para:
Note: Even if the time returned is precise to the second,
browsers round them to a higher interval
(typically to the closest 15 minutes) for privacy reasons.
